Number of clones with abundances $\geq$ 25 cells with integrations found near the same gene across multiple subjects. 

```{r echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
ppNum <- function(n) format(n, big.mark = ",", scientific = FALSE, trim = TRUE)
report <- readRDS('../report.rds')

tbl <- report$genesFoundAcrossMultSubject[,c('nearestFeature', 'WT.subjects', 'WT.maxAbundance', 'Y664F.subjects', 'Y664F.maxAbundance')]
names(tbl) <- c('Nearest gene', 'Subjects', 'Max abundance', 'Subjects', 'Max abundance')

kable(tbl, "latex",  row.names = F, booktabs = T, linesep = '', align = 'lcccc') %>% 
  add_header_above(c(" " = 1, "WT" = 2, "Y664F" = 2)) %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("striped"), font_size = 10)
```
